description: Providing a splash of modernity in the Florentine Chianti region, this restaurant is highly contemporary both in its decor and its cuisine, the latter available in the form of tasting menus only (guests can choose the number of courses they want). Meat and fish are cooked with expert precision and prepared with real creative flair.
